name: Explara Lite
author: Explara

sections.description:
Managing events shouldn’t be complex and costly. Now integrate the power of Explara to your existing WordPress site with the Explara Lite Plugin. Easily integrate Explara Groups, Members & Events into your website using Shortcodes.

Salient Features

  • Multiple Shortcode options available
  • Choose between different views

  • Like the plugin or want features? Tweet to us @askexplara

Plugin Support

Dedicated Support: talk to us on Twitter @askexplara

To raise issues or if you have a question for us, post to the support forum here https://wordpress.org/support/plugin/explara-lite and we are happy to help.

Requirements

  • WordPress 4.6 or greater
  • PHP 5.6 or greater (7.0 recommended)
  • MySQL 5.2 or greater (5.x recommended)
sections.installation:
1. Download [explara-lite.zip]
    2.Upload the ‘explara-lite.zip’ file from the Plugins->Add New page in the WordPress administration panel.
    3.Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

Explara Lite Work flow Explained

Once Explara Lite plug-in is installed and activated, you can see Explara Lite on the sidebar menu section.

  1. Add the token
  2. Add the domain detail
  3. Generate shortcode as per requirements.
sections.faq:
Something isn’t working. Help!

  • First try deactivating and reactivating the plugin
  • If that doesn’t fix the problem, try deleting and reinstalling the plugin
  • If that doesn’t work, you should file a bug report.
